% using koma articl with a4paper, 11pt fontsize
\documentclass{scrartcl}

% use pps styles
\usepackage{ppsdocument}
\usepackage{ppsbe}

% textile required packages
\usepackage{listings}
\usepackage[normalem]{ulem}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{float}
\usepackage{multirow}
\usepackage{makeidx}
\usepackage{hyperref}

% enable code line numbers
\lstset{numbers=left}

% titlepage macros
\title{}
\author{}
\date{}

% initialize makeindex
\makeindex

\begin{document}
	\selectlanguage{ngerman}

	% title on the first page
	\maketitle

	% table of contents
	\tableofcontents

	% list of figures
	% \listoffigures

	% input
	\input{document.tex}

	% print index
	\printindex
	
\end{document}
